articles.title: ‘He should be punished’: Hodge slams Henriques for sledge but Sixers skipper won’t be sanctioned - Sydney Morning Herald

articles.title: Star copies Kournikova in all the wrong ways - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: World No. 2 Aryna Sabalenka managed to bounce back after her serve fell apart yet again, recovering from a set down to beat Xinyu Wang from China 1-6 6-4 6-2.
